@littlekope0903 @jlengstorf @trevorbrindlejs @PichuPlayer @josiahrooney @Netlify @gatsbyjs Peeking at the recent deploys... it doesn't looks like there has recently been a build without using the cache. When your package.json changes, that will clear the Netlify build cache and re-install dependencies, or you can force it by triggering a build manually, as shown here: https://t.co/97D64HODQg
